title: Llanrwst crash: Woman airlifted to hospital and three others hurt
article: An elderly woman was airlifted to hospital after a crash on the A470 in Conwy on Sunday. North Wales Police said they were called to the incident in Maenan, Llanrwst, at about 15:10 BST. A blue Mazda 6 and a black Peugeot 208 collided near the entrance to the Maenan Abbey Hotel, injuring the woman and three others. She was taken by air ambulance to a hospital in Stoke, said Sgt Jason Diamond.Some of the other casualties also required treatment, he said. Sgt Diamond appealed for witnesses or anyone with dash cam footage to contact police.
